tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sahni is like a god to me... I found him on practo ... When all the other surgeon is only proposing me for surgery. Where he has explained to me in detail and let me decide on the treatment that can be done in both ways by surgery or by a cast only... The cast takes more time but who wants to get the screw in the body... I am happy that I decided to be in a cast for 6weeks and slowly get recovered... He is a genuine surgeon whose purpose is not to mke money, he uses his experience & gives his best in any way. I truly say he makes me stand on my feet again. God bless to you sir... Live long!!
